name: sandstorm
description: Sandstorm is a self-hosted platform to run web apps securely in isolated sandboxes. It includes app packaging, updates, and permissions control, ideal for personal cloud services.
features: App sandboxing: Runs each application in isolated containers for enhanced security.
One-click installs: Deploy web apps from the app market with a single click.
Automatic updates: Keeps installed apps up-to-date with automatic version management.
Granular permissions: Control app access to data and resources with fine-grained permissions.
Sharing controls: Share app instances with specific users or groups with customizable access levels.
Single sign-on: Unified authentication across all installed apps with OAuth and LDAP support.
App packaging: Package any web app using the Sandstorm packaging format for distribution.
Resource isolation: Prevents apps from interfering with each other through strict resource limits.
Backup and restore: Export and import app data for migration and disaster recovery.
Mobile friendly: Access and manage apps from mobile devices with responsive interfaces.
Activity logs: Track app usage and access patterns for security auditing.
Custom domains: Map custom domains to individual app instances for professional deployment.
